item.title: 波音公司提议为罢工工人加薪 30%，并称这是 "最终 "提议
item.description: 周一，波音公司向数千名罢工工人提出了更高的工资建议，提出在四年内将工资普遍提高 30%，波音公司称这是其在罢工持续期间提出的 "最好也是最后的 "建议。【原文：Boeing upped its wage proposal to thousands of striking workers on Monday, offering a 30% general wage increase over four years in what it called its "best and final" offer as the strike drags on.】

item.title: 内幕交易限制到期后，特朗普传媒股价跌至新低
item.description: 周一，美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体公司股价暴跌超过 5%，创下新低，在内幕抛售限制到期后扩大了近期的跌幅。【原文：Shares of former U.S. President Donald Trump's media company tumbled over 5% to a new low on Monday, extending recent losses after restrictions on insider selling expired.】

item.title: 飓风风险增加，能源公司撤离美国墨西哥湾非必要人员
item.description: 据预测，风暴将在本周中期变成飓风，在此之前，美国近海石油生产商正在采取初步措施，从墨西哥湾生产平台撤离非必要人员。【原文：U.S. offshore oil producers were taking initial steps ahead of a storm predicted to become a hurricane in the middle of the week, evacuating non-essential staff from Gulf of Mexico production platforms.】

item.title: 企业要求世界各国领导人在联合国落实可再生能源目标
item.description: 几家大公司的高管周一敦促世界各国领导人落实去年在迪拜举行的 COP28 峰会上达成的国际协议，即到 2030 年将可再生能源发电能力提高两倍，以应对气候变化。【原文：Executives from several major companies urged world leaders on Monday to follow through on an international agreement, made at the COP28 summit in Dubai last year, to triple renewable-energy capacity by 2030 to fight climate change.】

item.title: Blackrock 获意大利批准持有莱昂纳多超过 3% 的股份
item.description: 周一的一份政府文件显示，全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）已获得意大利政府批准，持有国防和航空航天集团莱昂纳多（Leonardo）3%以上的股份。【原文：BlackRock , the world's biggest asset manager, has secured Italian government approval to hold a stake of more than 3% in defence and aerospace group Leonardo , a government document showed on Monday.】

item.title: 在可能发生港口罢工之际，美国劳工部与雇主团体进行接触
item.description: 美国劳工部周一表示，在国际码头工人协会（International Longshoremen's Association）可能在东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸举行港口罢工之前，已与美国海事联盟（United States Maritime Alliance）进行了接触。【原文：The U.S. Department of Labor has reached out to the United States Maritime Alliance ahead of a possible ports strike on the East Coast and Gulf Coast by the International Longshoremen's Association, the employer group said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国诉讼称丰田叉车发动机排放作弊
item.description: 丰田公司在美国被提起集体诉讼，指控这家日本汽车制造商的九款叉车发动机存在排放作弊行为。【原文：Toyota has been sued in a proposed U.S. class action accusing the Japanese automaker of emissions cheating in nine engines for its forklift trucks.】

item.title: 美联储文件勾勒出央行抵押贷款债券的缓慢卸载过程
item.description: 根据美国中央银行的最新研究，几乎所有可能的美国利率走势都将使美联储在十年后持有多达 6,000 亿美元的抵押贷款债券，这可能会支持美联储直接出售这些证券，以实现债券组合主要由国债组成的目标。【原文：Almost any likely path for U.S. interest rates will leave the Federal Reserve owning as much as $600 billion in mortgage bonds a decade from now, according to new U.S. central bank research that could bolster a case for selling the securities outright to meet a goal of a bond portfolio composed mostly of Treasuries.】

item.title: 官员称，根据规定，通用汽车和福特需要停止向美国出口中国汽车
item.description: 美国商务部一位官员周一告诉路透社，根据一项打击中国软件和硬件的拟议规定，通用汽车和福特汽车将需要停止从中国向美国出口汽车。【原文：General Motors and Ford Motor would need to stop exporting vehicles from China to the United States under a proposed rule cracking down on Chinese software and hardware, a Commerce Department official told Reuters Monday.】

item.title: 加州就全球塑料污染问题起诉埃克森公司
item.description: 加利福尼亚州总检察长周一宣布，该州已对石油巨头埃克森美孚提起诉讼，指控其在全球塑料垃圾污染中的作用。【原文：California has filed a lawsuit against oil giant Exxon Mobil over its alleged role in global plastic waste pollution, its attorney general announced on Monday.】

item.title: 赛诺菲首席执行官仍在考虑如何分拆消费品业务，希望保留部分股份
item.description: 赛诺菲首席执行官保罗-赫德森（Paul Hudson）周一表示，公司尚未就如何分拆旗下的奥佩拉（Opella）消费者保健部门做出最终决定，但有意在分拆完成后保留该业务的股份。【原文：Sanofi Chief Executive Paul Hudson said on Monday that the company has not made a final decision yet on how it plans to split off its Opella consumer healthcare unit, but that it is interested in keeping a stake in the business after the separation is done.】

item.title: 受热带骚动影响，雪佛龙公司从墨西哥湾工地运送非必要人员
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）周一表示，受墨西哥湾热带骚乱影响，非必要人员正被运离墨西哥湾设施。【原文：Chevron Corp said on Monday that nonessential personnel were being transported from their Gulf of Mexico facilities due to the tropical disturbance in the Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 首席财务官表示，Stellantis 的目标是到 2025 年初将北美库存减少 10 万件
item.description: 克莱斯勒母公司斯特兰蒂斯公司首席财务官娜塔莉-奈特（Natalie Knight）周一表示，该公司正寻求在明年年初之前将北美库存减少 10 万辆汽车，并已在 7 月和 8 月削减了约 4.5 万辆汽车。【原文：Chrysler-parent Stellantis is seeking to decrease its North American inventories by 100,000 vehicles by the start of next year, and has already cut about 45,000 units in July and August, CFO Natalie Knight said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比认为未来将有 "更多次 "降息
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周一表示，他预计 "明年还会有很多次降息"，因为美国央行正在寻求经济软着陆，即在控制通胀的同时又不使劳动力市场崩溃。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee on Monday said he expects "many more rate cuts over the next year" as the U.S. central bank seeks a soft landing for the economy, where it controls inflation without crashing the labor market.】

item.title: 纽约联储称，美国国债市场流动性恢复到美联储紧缩前水平
item.description: 纽约联储的一份报告显示，全球最大的政府债券市场--价值 27 万亿美元的美国国债市场的流动性已恢复到美联储 2022 年开始加息之前的水平。【原文：Liquidity in the $27 trillion U.S. Treasury market, the largest government bond market in the world, is back to levels seen before the Federal Reserve started hiking interest rates in 2022, according to a New York Fed report.】

item.title: 消息人士称，通用大西洋公司计划年底前在阿布扎比设立办事处
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，General Atlantic 计划在年底前开设阿布扎比办事处，并从伦敦调来一名交易员作为新团队的首任成员。【原文：General Atlantic plans to open an Abu Dhabi office by the end of the year and move a dealmaker from London as an inaugural member of the new team, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国 9 月商业活动保持稳定；价格压力回升
item.description: 9 月份，美国商业活动保持稳定，但商品和服务的平均价格上涨速度为 6 个月来最快，这可能暗示未来几个月通胀率将回升。【原文：U.S. business activity was steady in September, but average prices charged for goods and services rose at the fastest pace in six months, potentially hinting at a pickup in inflation in the coming months.】

item.title: 高通公司收购英特尔的可能性可能引发反垄断和代工厂的担忧
item.description: 分析师表示，收购英特尔的潜在交易可能会加速高通公司的多元化发展，但将给这家智能手机芯片制造商带来一个亏损的半导体制造部门，它可能难以扭亏为盈或出售该部门。【原文：A potential deal to buy Intel could accelerate Qualcomm's diversification but will burden the smartphone chipmaker with a loss-making semiconductor manufacturing unit that it may struggle to turn around or sell, analysts said.】

item.title: 白宫将制定计划保护美国汽车业，避免第二次 "中国冲击
item.description: 白宫最高经济顾问莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）计划于周一阐述拜登政府保护美国汽车行业免受其所认为的中国不公平贸易行为影响的广泛方法。【原文：Top White House economic adviser Lael Brainard plans to lay out on Monday the Biden administration's broad approach to safeguarding the U.S. auto sector from what it considers China's unfair trade actions.】

item.title: 零售商名创优品将以 8.93 亿美元收购中国永辉近 30% 的股份
item.description: 家用消费品零售商名创优品周一表示，将以 63 亿元人民币（8.9308 亿美元）的价格收购永辉超市 29.4% 的股份，有望成为这家中国公司最大的单一股东。【原文：MINISO will take up a 29.4% stake in retailer Yonghui Superstores for 6.3 billion yuan ($893.08 million), the household consumer goods retailer said on Monday, on track to becoming the largest single shareholder in the Chinese firm.】

item.title: 米莱领导下的阿根廷美元存款激增 80 亿美元
item.description: 自自由派总统哈维尔-米莱 12 月上任以来，阿根廷的外币存款猛增了约 80 亿美元，这主要是受到一系列有利于市场的紧缩措施和吸引美元重返金融体系的激励措施的推动。【原文：Argentina's foreign currency deposits have jumped by around $8 billion since libertarian President Javier Milei took office in December, driven by a series of pro-market austerity measures and incentives to lure dollars back into the financial system.】

item.title: Tempur Sealy 将剥离 100 多家门店，以完成价值 40 亿美元的 Mattress Firm 交易
item.description: Tempur Sealy 国际公司周一表示，该公司计划出售 100 多家门店，以获得监管部门对其与 Mattress Firm 40 亿美元交易的批准。【原文：Tempur Sealy International said on Monday it plans to sell more than 100 stores in a bid to get regulatory approval for its $4 billion deal with Mattress Firm.】

item.title: Biohaven 的遗传病药物达到主要试验目标
item.description: Biohaven 公司周一表示，该公司对一种主要影响大脑的遗传性疾病患者进行的一项药物评估研究已达到主要目标。【原文：Biohaven has met the main goal in a study evaluating its drug in patients with an inherited disease that mainly affects the brain, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克：经济恢复正常的速度快于预期，因此政策也应如此
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周一发表评论称，美国经济已接近正常的通胀率和失业率，美联储也需要货币政策 "正常化"，这表明美联储对未来几个月加快降息步伐持开放态度。【原文：The U.S. economy is close to normal rates of inflation and unemployment and the Federal Reserve needs monetary policy to "normalize" as well, Atlanta Federal Reserve president Raphael Bostic said Monday in comments that suggested openness to a quick pace of interest rate cuts in coming months.】

item.title: 阿联酋在拜登会谈中寻求建立更紧密的人工智能和技术联系，中国的兴趣引发美国担忧
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登将于周一接待阿拉伯联合酋长国总统的来访，届时白宫将就这个海湾国家的人工智能计划举行会谈，这一雄心勃勃的努力也引起了美国地缘政治竞争对手中国的兴趣。【原文：President Joe Biden will host the United Arab Emirates president on Monday for a visit set to include White House talks on the Gulf state's plans for artificial intelligence, an ambitious effort also drawing interest from U.S. geopolitical rival China.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行周四降息 25 个基点，12 月维持不变
item.description: 路透社调查显示，瑞士国家银行将在周四将基准利率下调 25 个基点，这是瑞士国家银行连续第三次下调基准利率。【原文：The Swiss National Bank will cut its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points on Thursday for a third straight meeting, according to a significant bulk of economists polled by Reuters, a slight majority of whom said the SNB would hold in December.】

item.title: 拜登提议禁止中国车辆在美国上路，并通过软件打击来实现这一目标
item.description: 出于国家安全考虑，美国商务部周一提议禁止中国的关键软件和硬件在美国道路上的联网汽车中使用，此举将有效禁止几乎所有中国汽车进入美国市场。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department on Monday proposed prohibiting key Chinese software and hardware in connected vehicles on American roads due to national security concerns - a move that would effectively bar nearly all Chinese cars from entering the U.S. market.】

item.title: 以色列科技行业具有活力，但在与哈马斯的战争中面临资金不确定性
item.description: 周一的一份政府报告显示，在与巴勒斯坦伊斯兰组织哈马斯长达一年的战争中，以色列的科技行业一直保持着顽强的生命力，但由于它依赖于大公司和外国投资，该行业面临的资金不确定性可能会损害更广泛的经济。【原文：Israel's tech sector has remained resilient during a year-long war with Palestinian Islamist group Hamas but as it relies on large companies and foreign investment, the sector faces funding uncertainty that could harm the broader economy, a government report showed on Monday.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官期待工会在紧张谈判中做出重大让步
item.description: 在就工厂关闭和新工资协议举行会谈的前两天，大众汽车公司首席执行官期待工会就如何削减成本和缩小与竞争对手的差距提出建议。【原文：Volkswagen's CEO expects labour unions to make proposals on how to cut costs and close a gap with competitors, two days before talks over plant closures and new wage deals.】

item.title: 比特大陆与 Riot 达成协议，弗里德曼被任命为董事会成员
item.description: 比特币矿商比特大陆（Bitfarms）周一表示，已与竞争对手和第一大股东Riot Platforms达成和解协议，根据协议，艾米-弗里德曼（Amy Freedman）将被任命为董事会成员。【原文：Bitcoin miner Bitfarms said on Monday it had entered into a settlement agreement with rival and top shareholder Riot Platforms , under which Amy Freedman was appointed to its board.】
